message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on Bob, meet me halfway, time is ticking!
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  This is my final offer!
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Alice, let's be real. This back and forth is pointless. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but the clock is ticking!
